title: post api webhooks vapi webhook processing
description: Verify that the POST /api/webhooks/vapi endpoint correctly processes incoming Vapi webhook events for call started, ended, transcript, and recording, ensuring proper handling and response.

title: post api calls start outbound call initiation
description: Test the POST /api/calls/start endpoint to ensure it initiates outbound calls correctly with provided leads, vapiAgentId, and selectedVoice parameters.

title: get api calls dashboard retrieve call logs
description: Validate that the GET /api/calls-dashboard endpoint returns the list of call logs with correct filtering, pagination, and analytics data.

title: get post api assistants manage ai assistants
description: Check the GET /api/assistants endpoint for listing AI assistants and the POST /api/assistants endpoint for creating new assistants with proper data validation.

title: post api knowledge base upload document
description: Ensure the POST /api/knowledge-base/upload endpoint allows uploading documents to the knowledge base, triggering chunking, embedding, and indexing processes.

title: post api knowledge base query knowledge base
description: Test the POST /api/knowledge-base/query endpoint to verify querying the knowledge base returns relevant results based on the input query.

title: post api vapi setup integration setup
description: Validate the POST /api/vapi/setup endpoint for setting up Vapi integration, ensuring correct configuration and response.

title: post api inbound config update inbound call handling
description: Test the POST /api/inbound/config endpoint to update inbound call handling configuration and verify changes are applied correctly.

title: get api founder console settings retrieve settings
description: Verify the GET /api/founder-console/settings endpoint returns the current founder console settings accurately.
